trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref><xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsModeChanged"></xref> and <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeModeChanged"></xref> events.
trans-unit.target: Gir dataene for den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsModeChanged"> </xref> og <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeModeChanged"> </xref> hendelser.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsModeChanged> event is raised when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsMode%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control changes.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsModeChanged>denne hendelsen oppstår når verdien for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsMode%2A>for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>kontrollere endringer.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsMode%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsModeChanged>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeModeChanged> event is raised when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeMode%2A> property changes.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeModeChanged>denne hendelsen oppstår når verdien for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeMode%2A>egenskapsendringer.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeMode%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeModeChanged>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [NIB: bruker hendelser](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeModeEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeModeEventArgs"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: When implementing a source for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsModeChanged?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeModeChanged?displayProperty=fullName> events, pass in `true` for `previousModeAutoSized` if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> already had an automatic resizing mode and the new mode is different.
trans-unit.target: Ved implementering av en datakilde for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsModeChanged?displayProperty=fullName>og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeModeChanged?displayProperty=fullName>hendelser, sendes i `true` for `previousModeAutoSized` hvis den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>allerede hadde en automatisk endring av størrelse modus, og den nye modusen er forskjellig.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeModeChanged?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsModeChanged?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property was previously set to any <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowsMode"></xref> value other than <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowsMode"></xref> or the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property was previously set to any <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeadersWidthSizeMode"></xref> value other than <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeadersWidthSizeMode"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeadersWidthSizeMode"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> egenskapen tidligere skulle noen <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowsMode"> </xref> verdi enn <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowsMode"> </xref> eller <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> egenskapen tidligere skulle noen <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeadersWidthSizeMode"> </xref> verdi enn <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeadersWidthSizeMode"> </xref> eller <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeadersWidthSizeMode"> </xref>; ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value specifying whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> was previously set to automatically resize.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> tidligere skulle skaleres automatisk på nytt.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeModeEventArgs> class is used with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsModeChanged?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeModeChanged?displayProperty=fullName> events, so this property relates specifically to the previous state of either the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeModeEventArgs>Klassen brukes med <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsModeChanged?displayProperty=fullName>og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeModeChanged?displayProperty=fullName>hendelser, slik at denne egenskapen er spesielt forbundet med den forrige tilstanden til enten den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>eller <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeModeChanged?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsModeChanged?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeModeEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property was previously set to any <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowsMode"></xref> value other than <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowsMode"></xref> or the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property was previously set to any <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeadersWidthSizeMode"></xref> value other than <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeadersWidthSizeMode"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeadersWidthSizeMode"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> egenskapen tidligere skulle noen <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowsMode"> </xref> verdi enn <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowsMode"> </xref> eller <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> egenskapen tidligere skulle noen <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeadersWidthSizeMode"> </xref> verdi enn <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeadersWidthSizeMode"> </xref> eller <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeadersWidthSizeMode"> </xref>; ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.
